column4: ***Attention*** Firefox Users = If you ever what to use Google Chrome or Chromium. Please rememnber to uninstall "Ad-Block Plus" That just F@cksup all Google Browsers
works here for me (firefox and chromium)
Do me a favour. With Chromum go to Google.com and search Webupd8 and press enter. Wait for 5 seconds
What version Ubutnu are you using?
Google Chrome & Chromium stalls when I did that. Now it's fixed
whats diffrent in Xubuntu compared to Ubuntu?
xfce instead of gnome or unity
Is it more user friendly? Or should I stay with buntu for that?
How do I refresh my Icons in my taskbar
depends on what you like, I don't like unity's interface and I've never liked gnome2 (and especially don't like gnome3)
It just seems that most apps are for gnome
I like gtk apps over qt and xfce uses gtk (just like gnome)
anything that works in gnome works in xfce
Can I run Compiz in xfce? I like the effects
